text: The Paris Commune (, ) was a revolutionary government that took power in Paris, the capital of France, from 18 March to 28 May 1871. ==Cause== ===Historical context=== On 2 September 1870, France was defeated in the Battle of Sedan during the Franco-Prussian War, and Napoleon III was captured. When the news reached Paris, angry people came out into the streets. Empress Eug√©nie fled Paris and the government of the Second Empire collapsed. Republicans of the National Assembly created the French Third Republic, and formed a Government of National Defence to continue the war. ==References== Category:History of Paris Category:1870s in France Category:Anarchism
title: Paris Commune
